amendment.description: To restore $1 billion to juvenile justice and local law enforcement programs funded by the Department of Justice.

vote.text: Amendment SA 217 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 217 proposed by Senator Kohl. (consideration: CR S2953) To restore $1 billion to juvenile justice and local law enforcement programs funded by the Department of Justice.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 217 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 217 proposed by Senator Kohl.
